sentences.en: Design, manufacture, building or preparing watercrafts , metallic member , selling materials and steels of watercraft.
sentences.cn: 设计 、 制造 、 修造船舶、金属构件 、 销售船舶材料及钢材.

sentences.en: Either way it seems certain that these people were using quite sophisticated technology and watercraft to fish offshore.
sentences.cn: 不管人们用的那种方法抓鱼，似乎可以肯定，那些人使用了娴熟的技术和船只。

sentences.en: He won the first prize by his outstanding watercraft at swimming.
sentences.cn: 他凭借高超的泳技获得了游泳比赛的头奖.

sentences.en: People use “jet ski” to refer to a wide variety of personal watercraft; “rollerblade” to mean any inline skates—and “chupacabra” to mean any weird animal.
sentences.cn: 人们用“jet ski”这个词组表示各种各样的个人船只；用“rollerblade”这个词表示任何直排轮滑——也用“卓帕卡布拉”来表示任何神秘的动物。

sentences.en: See a 1930 s sawmill and exhibits on shipbuilding, watercraft restoration and marine engines.
sentences.cn: 领略一家1930年的锯木厂以及造船业, 船只修复和船用柴油机的展览.

sentences.en: The most severe threat to watercraft formation is anti - ship missile under high - technology war conditions.
sentences.cn: 现代高技术战争条件下补给及战斗保障船艇编队的最大威胁是 反 舰导弹.

sentences.en: The old sailor was respected because of his experience with watercraft.
sentences.cn: 老水手的驾船经验丰富,受到人们尊敬.

sentences.en: The paper analyses the factors that influence the reliability of fire alarm system in watercraft.
sentences.cn: 摘要分析了船舶火灾报警系统中影响可靠性的因素.

sentences.en: To convey in a watercraft propelled by paddles.
sentences.cn: 搬运,运输在用船桨推动的船只内输送.

sentences.en: To propel ( a watercraft ) with paddles or a paddle.
sentences.cn: 用浆划动用船桨推动 ( 船只 )

sentences.en: When the Coast Guard spotted the vessel off the coast of Honduras, its crew sank the watercraft. They were later detained, according to a Coast Guard press release.
sentences.cn: 据海岸警卫队透漏的消息，当海岸警卫队在洪都拉斯海岸截获该船的时候，船员将船沉入到了海底，随即，他们被拘捕了。

trans.tran_en: a boat or ship or such vessels collectively
